ServerCmdThread

public ServerCmdThread(java.awt.Component parent,
                       TangoHost[] hosts,
                       int cmd)
Thread Constructor for many hosts.

Parameters:
parent - The application parent used as parent for ProgressMinitor.
hosts - The controlled hosts.
cmd - command to be executed on all hosts.

Parameters:
parent - The application parent used as parent for ProgressMinitor.
host - The controlled host.
cmd - command to be executed on all hosts.
levelUsed - true if level is used by server on this host.
